name: Dragon Ball Z: Kyoushuu! Saiya Jin
summary: Dragon Ball Z: Kyôshū! Saiyan (ドラゴンボールZ 強襲!サイヤ人 Doragon Bōru Zetto Kyōshū! Saiyajin?, Dragon Ball Z: Fierce Attack! Saiyan) was the first Dragon Ball Z game to be released for the Famicom system. It was released by Bandai on October 27, 1990 in Japan. The game features Brocco, Pumpkin (two illusion Saiyans who fight Yamcha and Tien in the anime) and Onion (an original who transforms into a Giant Ape).
